description: Represents the validity of the SSL certificate in days.
interpretation: As this value approaches 0, an alert is generated to inform the administrator that the SSL certificate is nearing expiry. A value of 0 indicates that the SSL certificate has expired.
troubleshootingSteps: Set graduated alerts (for example at 90, 60, 30, 15, and 7 days before expiry) via your monitoring system so renewals are never missed.[web:601][web:602][web:605][web:614]
Maintain an inventory of all certificates (domains, issuers, expiry dates, locations) in a central system or certificate management platform.[web:601][web:602][web:603][web:608]
